alert.note: Alert for Chariton; Linn; Macon (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 02 at 4:55PM CDT until June 02 at 5:30PM CDT by NWS Kansas City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Pleasant Hill has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... North central Chariton County in north central Missouri... Southeastern Linn County in north central Missouri... West central Macon County in north central Missouri... * Until 530 PM CDT. * At 455 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Bucklin, or 8 miles north of Marceline, moving west at 10 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Marceline, Bucklin and Saint Catherine. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
